definition[0]: the time that is happening now
example[0]: Stop worrying about the past and live in the present.
example[1]: The film is set sometime between 1995 and the present.
example[2]: ‘When do you want to start?’ ‘Well, there’s no time like the present (=used to say that if you are going to do something at all, you should do it now).’
definition[1]: the form of the verb that shows what exists or is happening now
